title: Multigrain Tuna Tabbouleh with Creamy Black Olive Vinaigrette
summary: Multigrain Tuna Tabbouleh with Creamy Black Olive Vinaigrette is a gluten free, dairy free, and pescatarian main course. One portion of this dish contains approximately 18g of protein, 3g of fat, and a total of 278 calories. This recipe serves 4. For $1.43 per serving, this recipe covers 23% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. This recipe is typical of middl eastern cuisine. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 9 minutes. If you have parsley, tomato, salt, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the grain blend you could follow this main course with the Honeyed Yogurt and Mixed Berries with Whole-Grain Waffles as a dessert. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 92%. This score is great. Try Pasta with Tunan and Black Olive Vinaigrette, Seared "marinated" Tuna with Black-Olive Vinaigrette, and Tuna Pasta Salad With Warm Black Olive Vinaigrette for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: Tuna works really well with Merlot, Pinot Noir, and rosé Wine. Though fish is often paired with white wine, 'meatier' fish like tuna can absolutely go with red wine. A Rosé will also pair nicely, particularly if your tunan is prepared with ingredients better suited to a white wine. One wine you could try is Robert Mondavi Napa Merlot. It has 4 out of 5 stars and a bottle costs about 30 dollars.

productMatches.title: Robert Mondavi Napa Merlot
productMatches.description: The wine's multi-dimensional flavors come from grapes grown in distinctly different terroirs of Napa Valley, including the Carneros, Stags Leap and Oakville districts. Traditional techniques, including native yeasts, extended maceration, aging in French oak barrels and bottling without filtration, enhanced the wine's complexity. This wine is delicious with many entrees and cheeses. One of our favorite food pairings is roast turkey with a wild mushroom and walnut stuffing. Roast leg of lamb, rubbed with fragrant herbs and spices, or grilled pork loin also marry perfectly with the wine's luscious flavors.

instructions: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl; toss well. Serve immediately, or cover and chill until ready to serve.

steps.step: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl; toss well.
Serve immediately, or cover and chill until ready to serve.
